doc.field: Collecting for the Future: 25 Years of Acquisitions; Yesterday's View of the Future: Revisiting the World's Fair of 1939; Artists and Architects of the New York Subway
Collecting for the Future: 25 Years of Acquisitions; Yesterday's View of the Future: Revisiting the World's Fair of 1939; Artists and Architects of the New York Subway

Includes color slides for the Revisiting the World's Fair of 1939 exhibition, however it is not clear whether the slides relate to this 1979 exhibition or the 1989 exhibition of the same name. Includes negatives for the subway exhibition.
Series II: Exhibitions >> Collecting for the Future: 25 Years of Acquisitions; Yesterday's View of the Future: Revisiting the World's Fair of 1939; Artists and Architects of the New York Subway
